AI_MODE_EXTREME_DESC:
A more improved version of the Hard Method, which already does it's prediction plays at the first card.
NOTE: The AI might be slower over time, because it does a lot of checks, the more turns have passed.
AI_MODE_HARD_DESC:
A harder AI, which does it's prediction plays at the second card.
This method stores all played cards into a vector of pairs and can that way check all played cards and play them, if it found a match.
AI_MODE_RANDOM_DESC:
Just a random AI through a pseudo-random generator.
This method is the fastest for this Game but also easiest method to beat.
This Method does what it says, playing randomly.
CARD_SELECTOR_TITLE: Select the cards you want to use.
CARDSET_SELECTOR_CONFIRM: Do you like to use this cardset?
CHARSET_SELECTOR_CONFIRM: Do you like to use this character set?
CREDITS_SPECIAL_THANKS_NS: For having the idea to use cubic bezier for animations, the falling cards animation on the game start and suggestions.
CREDITS_SPECIAL_THANKS_PK11: For helping me with an example on how to flip a card in 2D and suggestions.
CREDITS_SPECIAL_THANKS_UM: For better teaching me how cubic bezier works with an example and suggestions.
GAME_SCREEN_EXIT: Press START + SELECT to exit the Game.
GAME_SETTINGS_CARD_DELAY_TXT: Set the frame delay for the cards.
GAME_SETTINGS_ROUND_WIN_TXT: Set the amount of wins to win this Game.
LANG_SELECTOR_TITLE: Select the language you want to use.
RULES_DESC:
Select 2 cards each turn, if those show the same image, you've got a pair, else it's your opponents turn.

The Player with the most pairs wins, however note, that ties are also possible if an even number of pairs is used.
